name: BATTER-E
description:
Batter-e was an entry to the Ludum Dare 39 game jam, with the theme "Running out of Power".
It scored the 16th out of 990 games.  THIS GAME WAS MADE IN 2 DAYS It's a fun game anyways, but keep that in mind while playing ;)

You have to reach the top of the tower to get the Infinity Charger, a device that grants infinite power.

Batter-e needs power to live, or else he explodes. The more power you have, the better attacks you'll make -and the longer you'll live!

Can you reach the Infinity Charger?
